name: Lazy Thief
description:
Lazy Thief

Steal gems in the laziest way possible... by hurling rocks, throwing bouncy balls, and cutting ropes with ninja stars to drop colored gems onto matching colored blocks. 200 stars to collect, 50 levels to master, 1 lazy-ass thief.

This game is free with no ads for PC and Mac but if you have a buck or two to spare and want to support indie developers, please consider donating when you download. 

Ad-supported versions can be downloaded for free on iOS and Android as well!
